title: WL Martin Plan 24451
summary: Two-bedroom tiny home with flexible living space and charming cottage appeal.
description: Plan 24451 expands on tiny home living with two bedrooms and 850 sqft of well-planned space. The open great room combines living, dining, and kitchen while bedrooms provide private retreats. A covered porch extends living space outdoors. This design works beautifully as a guest house, rental unit, or primary residence for those embracing simplified living.
